Review Text: Absolutely the worst pizzas we have ever had. Undercooked, almost inedible. Unfriendly service. The 3 employees just stood around talking loudly while we ate. When we requested the bill, they said cash only. When we didn‚Äôt have enough cash, ‚Ä¶

Name: La Bettola
Review Text: A real good pizzeria. Here you get a quality pizza that actually taste as they do in Italy. Nice Italian music, a good atmosphere and friendly staff. I tried several pizzerias in the city but for this one i like to walk a few miles. And the price is great too. I can recommend it.

Name: La Bettola
Review Text:
Absolutely amazing. The staff was very friendly. The food was so good
Very traditional and the food is home made. You do have to wait, but like I said the food is home made. We will definitely be back before we fly home. The spaghetti is so delish. The noodles are so soft. Definitely a  must try.

Name: La Bettola
Review Text: Worst restaurant I have been to in my life. I ordered pizza here yesterday and I was vomiting within one hour!!! I still feel sick now. This place should be shut down, they are unhygienic! I have never experienced having to vomit after just ONE hour of eating food.

Name: La Bettola
